likes.fullText:
fastest possible reflections landed in drei today. can be baked or live, but w/o any trouble at all, a tiny hook & it's done. thx to a gist that @0beqz made and the help of @Andersonmancini. the demo below ran easy 120fps, lights are not even baked yet.

https://t.co/GE8ZLm76xR https://t.co/9tfaZjKw5M

likes.fullText: @StanusicA @bruno_simon @vasamonte We did try the grass at first. https://t.co/5UJRixAQu6. Parallax in the shader won't give you a real volume feeling for the grass. The only way to achieve that is by applying the parallax on multiple layers (procedural fur, looks like @ggsimm made a csb ğŸ˜https://t.co/gUb4j8EFZj) https://t.co/ivdpgj2fHp
